Imagery Description: Nike seated above to left, holding wreath above the head of nude youth holding spray in right hand and bending forward in front of woman seated on chair, with small 'skewer of fruit' in her right hand and mirror in left, above whose head a small white Eros is flying; to right, draped woman with wreath and fillet and seated halfNon Sepcifieddraped youth, holding parasol. Below the handle: white female head in profile to left.
